Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have been waiting for you. Come, let us see if
this vegetable of yours is as good as you claim.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eugh! This is terrible! Even dogs would cough it
back up!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Er, i-it would be a pity to let it go to waste, after
you went to the trouble of bringing it here,
though.
<PAGE>
I suppose I must eat it all, then. Indeed, we
must not allow food to go to waste!
<PAGE>
But do not forget for even a second what an
arduous chore eating this vegetable is.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Mm! <RED>∀</RED> Oh my, that was wonde---AHEM. I
mean, that was terrible! I've never tasted a more
bitter vegetable.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>However, it's only polite to give you a little credit
for your effort. The barest credit, mind you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>By the by, <MYNAME>, I noticed you haven't
eaten your portion yet. If you won't, I shall take
responsibility and finish it for you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ick. What IS this? I cannot believe how terrible it
is. This cannot truly have been the best you had
to offer.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
So I was correct all along...there was nothing
noteworthy about your farm. Well, this has been
a fine waste of time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Once you've finished eating that vegetable you
presume to be food, I'll thank you to be off.
<PAGE>
I've a rather busy schedule today, so I shall take
my leave. Good day.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, that was thoroughly underwhelming. It
seems this is one book whose cover tells all. I
feel silly for having expected better.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Ah well. I suppose the peasants may consider
this fit for consumption.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Anyway, now that we've reached the truth of the
matter, there's no need to dally. Finish up here
and be on your way.
